ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of CLAIRE KENNEDY of Toronto, Ontario, to be director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 28, 2015, in the place of Carol Hansell.
